body: Then we will have to modify the existing constructor to create the main_thread_dataset conditionally when the number of workers are more than 0, also if we need to validate the arguments now they will be conditional at the constructor with chunk support or not, I think sooner or later it will be ugly. That is the reason for the new constructor with a clear flag  indicating the chunk support.
